<title

    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Spotter (Investigator)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1850) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Investigator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=41)

**Prerequisites**
[Investigator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1844); expert in Perception

</column>

---

Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.
name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
